note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: VESNA manuals
tagline: Documentation for VESNA wireless sensor network platform
body:
[VESNA](http://sensorlab.ijs.si/hardware.html) is a modular and fully flexible platform for the development of wireless sensor networks developed at SensorLab at Jo≈æef Stefan Institute. Based on a high-performance microcontroller with ARM Cortex-M3 core and radio interface spanning over multiple ISM frequency bands it is designed to meet the requirements of diverse applications.

This page contains manuals and documentation for developers interested in developing software applications running on VESNA.

* [Open source development environment setup manual for Linux based development](http://sensorlab.github.com/vesna-manual/documents/install-guide-linux.pdf)
